issues: Integration typology typically requires more complex transaction layers than 12 total transactions
Only 4 entities with 8 accounts may be insufficient for effective money integration
Transaction count (12) appears too low for $88k+ amount without showing proper layering
No evidence of final integration methods (real estate, art purchases, etc.) in transaction details
Lack of geographic diversity in entities/accounts reduces typology realism
suggestions: Add 2-3 more entities to create proper business layering
Include 15-20 transactions with varied timing and amounts
Specify integration methods like property purchases or business investments
Add cross-border transactions to demonstrate geographic complexity
Include shell company structures or charitable donations as integration vehicles
